oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Country Cousin Club - 1953-11-28
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Country Cousin Club, originally broadcast 1953-11-28 at 7:00 am. Featuring Grant Turner reading letters from listeners and playing recorded music.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (String Time) (Herb Remington) (recording, excerpt) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner) -- Grant Turner reads a letter from Jean Melton -- Grant Turner reads a letter from Betty Brummer -- Grant Turner talks about the evening's Prince Albert Grand Ole Opry show -- Let Me Be The One (Hank Locklin) (recording) -- Grant Turner talks about driving safety -- Grant Turner reads a letter from Norma L. Talley -- Grant Turner reads a letter from Mrs Gilbert Pence -- Dig That Crazy Moon (Porter Wagoner) (recording, excerpt) -- Grant Turner reads a letter from Joyce Fay Featherston -- Closing statement (Grant Turner) -- Theme (String Time) (Herb Remington) (recording, excerpt) -- Harveys jingle (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Country cousin club (Radio program); Turner, Grant
